item.title: Crowdfunding Product Commercial - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a talented production person or team to create engaging advertisement videos for my product, the Softflex, featured at Alphatechapparel.com and on our kickstarter page https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/softflex/the-softflex-20-the-worlds-best-snow-hoodie.
These videos should be 45 seconds to 1:30 minutes long, designed for FB, IG, and TikTok paid ads.

The Softflex is a hybrid between a hoodie and a jacket, tailored for skiers, snowboarders, hikers, hunters, cold weather workers and outdoor enthusiasts. The ads need to be both informative and entertaining, highlighting the Softflex’s unique features and its appeal to our outdoorsy, mountain-dwelling customers. The content should resonate with active individuals who appreciate the style and functionality of our snow hoodie.

Requirements:
-Experience in producing high-quality video ads
-Ability to create informative yet fun and engaging content
-Understanding of outdoor and snow sports culture
-Proficiency in video editing software
-Access to a variety of clips that can relate to outdoor activities
-Understanding of social media ad strategies, including effective hooks and scroll-stopping techniques
To Apply:
-Please provide examples of your previous work, especially any relevant to outdoor or active lifestyle brands.


Posted On: June 20, 2024 22:19 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Commercial, Marketing Strategy, Crowdfunding, Content Writing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Commercial, Marketing Strategy, Crowdfunding, Content Writing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
